task.title: How to Edit Addresses
task.shortdesc: This set of tasks is meant to help the user learn how to edit an address in their MyPack Portal.

taskbody.prereq: In order to complete this task, the user must have access to mypack, may need their phone for duo-authentication if working on a laptop or computer, and have access to the internet.

step.cmd: From the left-hand navigation menu, select "Addresses".
Under the appropriate header, click on the address box under the appropriate header.
step.info: For example, select the "Home Address" header, if an address is defined and needs updated.

step.cmd: Update the address fields as neccessary.
